long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your WhatsApp Conversations with WA Send Plus!

Discover the ultimate WhatsApp companion with "ChatGPT for WASend Plus." This powerful Chrome extension brings ChatGPT's AI-powered insights and tips right into your WhatsApp chat, taking your messaging experience to a whole new level.

Features:

Magic Reply with Conversation by ChatGPT & Tuning:
Get ready to amaze your friends and colleagues with intelligent, context-aware responses. Our Magic Reply feature leverages ChatGPT's conversational skills to craft responses that fit seamlessly into your chat, making your messages stand out.

Voice-to-Text AI Assistant for Chat Transcription:
Transform the way you communicate on WhatsApp! Our Voice-to-Text AI Assistant takes your spoken words and converts them into text within your chat. Perfect for sending voice messages, interviews, or meeting notes, this feature ensures that your conversations are easily readable and accessible.

Marketing Messages Rewriter:
Turn mundane marketing messages into attention-grabbing content. Our Marketing Messages Rewriter transforms promotional text into engaging and persuasive messages, helping you make a bigger impact.

Customize Prompts for Personalised Interactions:
Tailor your interactions with ChatGPT by customising prompts. Make ChatGPT respond in a way that feels uniquely you, whether it's for fun or productivity.

Privacy Filter for WhatsApp Chat:
Take control of your privacy with our exclusive Privacy Filter. With this feature, you can safeguard sensitive information within your WhatsApp conversations. ChatGPT for WASend Plus allows you to blur, redact, or even password-protect specific parts of your chat, ensuring that your personal and confidential content remains safe and secure.

Guide Responses to Match Your Goal:
Direct ChatGPT to give you the information you need. Guide its responses to align with your goals, whether it's answering questions, providing recommendations, or generating creative content.

Utilize ChatGPT for a Multitude of Tasks:
Unlock the full potential of ChatGPT for a wide range of tasks. From content generation to brainstorming, ChatGPT for WASend Plus is your versatile AI assistant.

Elevate your WhatsApp conversations with ChatGPT's intelligence. Download "ChatGPT for WASend Plus" now and experience the future of messaging!



WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. WA Send Plus is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
